forum.content:
太多遺憾，來不及挽留
太多可惜，已無法重來
太多的話，早沒有意義
太多的愛，你卻已不在...

I didn't mean to hurt you, babe. Please believe me. It's the last thing that I would do to you. So pity that we can't go along till the end. You'd never know how regretful that I was. Yet I'm still here, waiting for your answer.

If possible, is there any chance for us to start over again?

Would you accept my apology and talk to me once more?

Could I... love u as before?

你... 願意回應我嗎?
forum.title: 【Still in love with me?】
